High Priority.citation: In this Agreement, 'Representatives' shall mean, with respect to any specified person, all of such person's subsidiaries and its and their respective directors, agents, representatives, employees, officers, management and advisors (including financial advisors, counsels, accountants and potential financiers).
High Priority.problem: The definition of 'Representatives' is too narrow. It must be expanded to explicitly include affiliates, shareholders, and potential syndicate members to allow for proper evaluation and potential consortium bids.
High Priority.suggested_replacement: The definition of 'Representatives' should be replaced with: 'your affiliates and your and their respective directors, officers, employees, consultants, advisers, shareholders, potential syndicate members, agents, representatives, and other providers of financing (collectively, 'Representatives'), who need to know such information for your evaluation of the Proposed Transaction.'

High Priority.citation: You agree that you will upon the Company's written request, at any time, immediately return... or, at your discretion, destroy... all copies of the Information... An exception is made... for that part of the Information which you or your Representatives are required by law or regulation to retain.
High Priority.problem: The return and destruction clause is too absolute. It fails to permit the retention of Information stored on automated backup systems or contained within internal work product (Secondary Information), which is operationally necessary.
High Priority.suggested_replacement: Upon the Company's written request, you shall return or destroy all Information. However, this obligation shall not apply to: (i) Information that you or your Representatives must retain under any applicable law, rule or regulation; (ii) Information and elaborations thereof as have been saved to electronic carriers under automatic archiving or data security procedures; and (iii) reports, notes or other materials prepared by or on behalf of you which incorporate Information ('Secondary Information'). Any Information or Secondary Information that is not returned or destroyed shall remain subject to the confidentiality terms of this Agreement.

High Priority.citation: You confirm that you are acting as principal and not as an agent or as part of a syndicate and that you will notify the Company in the event that you commence to work with any other potential investor...
High Priority.problem: This clause explicitly prohibits acting as part of a syndicate, which directly contradicts the requirement to permit consortium bids and collaboration with potential syndicate members.
High Priority.suggested_replacement: This clause must be deleted in its entirety.

High Priority.citation: ...you shall not, directly or indirectly... hire, employ, solicit the employment or endeavour to solicit or entice away... any person who is or becomes an employee, director, trade representative, manager, consultant, independent contractor or sub-contractor of the Company...
High Priority.problem: The non-solicitation clause is overly broad. It does not exempt hiring individuals who respond to general, non-targeted advertisements or make unsolicited applications. Furthermore, it does not exclude your affiliated portfolio companies from its restrictions.
High Priority.suggested_replacement: For a period of two (2) years from the date of this Agreement, you agree not to directly solicit for employment any employee of the Company with whom you had material contact in connection with the Proposed Transaction. This restriction shall not apply to any of your affiliated portfolio companies, nor shall it apply to employees who respond to general public advertisements, make an unsolicited application for employment, or are referred by a third-party recruiter who was not instructed to target the Company's employees.

High Priority.citation: In case of a breach of any clause of this Agreement, you shall pay to the Company a lump -- sum compensation (forfaitaire schadevergoeding) of EUR 50.000, to be increased by EUR 1.000 for each day...
High Priority.problem: This clause imposes a penalty or liquidated damages amount for a breach, which is prohibited. Liability must be limited to proven, direct damages only.
High Priority.suggested_replacement: This clause should be deleted and replaced with: 'Liability for a breach of this Agreement shall be limited to proven, direct damages. In no event shall either party be liable for any indirect, consequential, special, punitive, or incidental damages, or for any loss of profits, revenue, or data.'

Medium Priority.citation: You will not and shall procure that none of your Representatives will contact or hold discussions with any director, employee, self-employed service provider, agent, supplier, customer or consultant of the Company...
Medium Priority.problem: The no-contact clause is overly broad, restricting contact with suppliers, customers, and consultants. The restriction must be narrowed to apply only to directors, officers, or employees directly involved in the Proposed Transaction.
Medium Priority.suggested_replacement: Without the prior written consent of the Company, you agree not to contact any directors, officers, or employees of the Company in connection with the Proposed Transaction. This restriction shall not be breached by any contact made for another purpose than the purpose of evaluating and negotiating the Proposed Transaction.

Medium Priority.citation: Any assignment of this Agreement by you without the prior written consent of the Company (which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed) shall be void.
Medium Priority.problem: This clause creates a one-sided restriction on assignment. The Agreement should permit mutual assignment to affiliates without prior consent.
Medium Priority.suggested_replacement: This clause should be replaced with: 'Each party may assign or transfer its rights and obligations under this Agreement to any of its affiliates without the prior written consent of the other party.'

Low Priority.citation: You acknowledge and agree that you shall... be responsible for any breach of confidentiality under this Agreement by your Representatives (as if they had signed this Agreement).
Low Priority.problem: This clause imposes strict liability for breaches by Representatives. The preferred standard is an efforts-based obligation to reduce your liability for the actions of external parties.
Low Priority.suggested_replacement: You will use your best efforts to procure that each of your Representatives who receives any Information is aware of and adheres to the terms of this Agreement. You shall be responsible for any breach of the confidentiality obligations of this Agreement by your Representatives.

Low Priority.citation: The term Information shall not include such portions of Information which you can show: (a) are or become generally available to the public... (b) are lawfully in your possession... or (c) is independently developed by you...
Low Priority.problem: The definition of what is excluded from 'Information' is missing a standard market exception for information that is disclosed with the written permission of the disclosing party.
Low Priority.suggested_replacement: Add the following exception to the list: '(d) was disclosed by you pursuant to the written permission of a duly authorized representative of the Company.'

Low Priority.citation: Such confidentiality obligations shall survive termination of this Agreement for a period of three (3) years...
Low Priority.problem: The confidentiality term is three years. While this is the maximum acceptable duration, the preferred term is two years to limit long-term obligations.
Low Priority.suggested_replacement: The confidentiality term should be reduced from three (3) years to two (2) years.
